The porpuse of this notebook is to check how the vocabullary behave in the social 
networks. Specifically:  
- Check how the vocabullary usage change between networks.  
- Check how the vocabullary usage change between persons in the same network.  
- Check how the vocabullary usage change between the same person in the 
different networks.
